content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"1.   Badges \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM employees should carry a Google badge at all times while on Google premises and not try to enter without the badge.  Employees should not badge in other individuals even if you know them. When your badge is not working, or if you forget your badge, EPAM employees should contact the Google security office or your EPAM Manager.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not lose your Google badge, and do not loan it. If it is stolen or lost, report it to your EPAM manager immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not wear Google badges outside the Google site, the best is to hide it in the pocket of your jacket/coat or bag. Please make sure you do not leave your badge unattended or in sight of others such as in the window of the car.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not bring friends/ family to the Google worksite.  If an exception is needed, seek prior approval from your EPAM Delivery or Account Manager and follow Google security rules. Print a visitor label and ask to e-sign NDA. Please make sure your visitor wears a visitor bag and escorted in the Google premises.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"2.   Devices \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Never leave any laptop unattended. If it is stolen or lost report it to your EPAM manager immediately.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Do not transfer any Google data onto any storage device (USB stick, CD, phone, etc.).\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Please do not leave Google device in the car – if it cannot be avoided, please lock it in the trunk out of people's sight and do mind temperature etc.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Upon ending a Google assignment, EPAM employees must follow all protocols provided by your EPAM Manager to return Google equipment and information.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-1\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"3.   Documentation \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Physical documentation should be put in shred bins after you are finished with the work, and locked if still needed for work. Do not print document to take it outside of Google.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When leaving your desk, please lock your computer and put documents away; all documents must be locked and filed away at the end of the day or when not in use.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Retain documents and information only when and no longer than needed.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Be careful when discussing Google or EPAM issues via mobile or amongst yourselves around other people. Be aware that often non-authorized personnel may be nearby.\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
